name: Vector Art 3D Model File
summary: Learn about .V3V files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: V3V files are available for download for free from the Vector Art 3D Store. They are designed to let you preview 3D models, which are much larger in file size, before buying the 3D model.

After downloading a V3V file from the store, you can open the file with Vector Art 3D viewer. The program allows you to rotate, pan, and zoom the model and choose the material of the model. You can also save the model in JPEG or Bitmap format.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
